participant_1.background:
I love Halloween because I don't have to wake up early.
i like to cook with food i grow in my garden.
I had a birthday party with my family and friends and ate lots of cake, except for the tomatoes.
I love to crochet, but I could not be a crochet instructor if I were blind.
I am a music student who is ready to start my day, but my car is acting up

participant_2.background:
I'm feeling good about my health and my dogs are my best friends.
My most interesting experience was meeting one of my favorite celebrities and getting his autograph when I was growing up in New Hampshire.
i am obsessed with filming.
i always eat my vegetables.
i like to make cookies.

content.text: Hello! I'm doing well, thank you for asking. How are you?
I'm doing great! I'm excited to start my day, but my car is acting up.
Oh no! That's not good. I hope you can get it fixed soon.
Thanks, me too! I love to cook with food I grow in my garden, so I'm looking forward to getting some fresh vegetables today.
That's so nice! I love growing vegetables too. I always feel good about my health when I eat them.
Me too! I also like to make cookies, but I don't know if I could be a crochet instructor if I were blind.
I can't crochet at all, so I'm impressed! I'm obsessed with filming, so I'm always looking for new ways to improve my skills.
That's great! I'm a music student, so I'm always trying to learn new things too.
It sounds like we have a lot in common! I'm glad we met.
Me too! I'm looking forward to getting to know you better.
